name: Pace Against Chaos
description:
Pace Against Chaos

Utilise your cursor in a battle for screen domination against Chaos.

Your goal is to create Order, by making sure that at least the needed percentage of the board is the desired colour.

- Every colour in the board will spread if not blocked by another colour.
- Chaos constantly adds colours to try to stop you from reaching your goal

Strategize using the expanding patterns to ensure Victory!

**NOTE The restart button is bugged, press ESCape to return to menu and select the level.

Thanks to Jorik for some productive collaborative brainstorming and debugging sessions.
